sections.title: Sticky columns
examples: <flux:table container:class="max-h-80"> <flux:table.columns sticky class="bg-white dark:bg-zinc-900"> <flux:table.column sticky class="bg-white dark:bg-zinc-900">ID</flux:table.column> <!-- ... --> </flux:table.columns> <flux:table.rows> @foreach ($this->orders as $order) <flux:table.row :key="$order->id"> <flux:table.cell sticky class="bg-white dark:bg-zinc-900">{{ $order->id }}</flux:table.cell> <!-- ... --> </flux:table.row> @endforeach </flux:table.rows></flux:table>
